<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Interface to help hash various types through a hasher type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Via provided specializations of &#96;add&#96;, &#96;addRange&#96;, and &#96;addRangeElements&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// functions, various types (e.g. &#96;ArrayRef&#96;, &#96;StringRef&#96;, etc.) can be hashed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// without requiring any knowledge of hashed types from the hasher type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The only method expected from the templated hasher type &#96;HasherT&#96; is:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; void update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; Data)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Additionally, the following methods will be forwarded to the hasher type:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; decltype(std::declval&lt;HasherT &amp;&gt;().final()) final()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; decltype(std::declval&lt;HasherT &amp;&gt;().result()) result()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// From a user point of view, the interface provides the following:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; &#96;template&lt;typename T&gt; add(const T &amp;Value)&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">///   The &#96;add&#96; function implements hashing of various types.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; &#96;template &lt;typename ItT&gt; void addRange(ItT First, ItT Last)&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///   The &#96;addRange&#96; function is designed to aid hashing a range of values.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///   It explicitly adds the size of the range in the hash.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; &#96;template &lt;typename ItT&gt; void addRangeElements(ItT First, ItT Last)&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">///   The &#96;addRangeElements&#96; function is also designed to aid hashing a range of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">///   values. In contrast to &#96;addRange&#96;, it &#42;&#42;ignores&#42;&#42; the size of the range,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">///   behaving as if elements were added one at a time with &#96;add&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// User-defined &#96;struct&#96; types can participate in this interface by providing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">/// an &#96;addHash&#96; templated function. See the associated template specialization</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for details.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This interface does not impose requirements on the hasher</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; Data)&#96; method. We want to avoid collisions for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// variable-size types; for example for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">/// builder.add(&#123;1&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">/// builder.add(&#123;2, 3&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">/// builder.add(&#123;1, 2&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">/// builder.add(&#123;3&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">/// . Thus, specializations of &#96;add&#96; and &#96;addHash&#96; for variable-size types must</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not assume that the hasher type considers the size as part of the hash; they</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">/// must explicitly add the size to the hash. See for example specializations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for &#96;ArrayRef&#96; and &#96;StringRef&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Additionally, since types are eventually forwarded to the hasher&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;void update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;)&#96; method, endianness plays a role in the hash</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">/// computation (for example when computing &#96;add((int)123)&#96;).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Specifiying a non-&#96;native&#96; &#96;Endianness&#96; template parameter allows to compute</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stable hash across platforms with different endianness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a3790ea10d4f6d2364d6b1fb2bddfbf4e">HashBuilder</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilderbase/#abc0798b909ab86d9724d67362a53946e">HashBuilderBase</a>&lt;HasherT&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a1815b02e7fafbe2f603c7893bd131666"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a3790ea10d4f6d2364d6b1fb2bddfbf4e">HashBuilder</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a1815b02e7fafbe2f603c7893bd131666">add</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a770b706b2dcfbb64c717a1cbe9418874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a770b706b2dcfbb64c717a1cbe9418874">HasAddHashT</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(addHash(std::declval&lt;HashBuilder &amp;&gt;(), std::declval&lt;T &amp;&gt;()));</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Implement hashing for user-defined &#96;struct&#96;s.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Any user-define &#96;struct&#96; can participate in hashing via &#96;HashBuilder&#96; by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// providing a &#96;addHash&#96; templated function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///              const UserDefinedStruct &amp;Value);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// struct SimpleStruct &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   char c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int i;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///              const SimpleStruct &amp;Value) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   HBuilder.add(Value.c);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   HBuilder.add(Value.i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// To avoid endianness issues, specializations of &#96;addHash&#96; should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// generally rely on exising &#96;add&#96;, &#96;addRange&#96;, and &#96;addRangeElements&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// functions. If directly using &#96;update&#96;, an implementation must correctly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// handle endianness.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// struct &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95; ((packed)) StructWithFastHash &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int I;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   char C;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   // If possible, we want to hash both &#96;I&#96; and &#96;C&#96; in a single</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   // &#96;update&#96; call for performance concerns.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   friend void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                       const StructWithFastHash &amp;Value) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     if (Endianness == llvm::endianness::native) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       HBuilder.update(ArrayRef(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;const uint8&#95;t &#42;&gt;(&amp;Value), sizeof(Value)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#125; else &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       // Rely on existing &#96;add&#96; methods to handle endianness.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       HBuilder.add(Value.I);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       HBuilder.add(Value.C);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// To avoid collisions, specialization of &#96;addHash&#96; for variable-size</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// types must take the size into account.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// struct CustomContainer &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// private:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   size&#95;t Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int Elements&#91;100&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// public:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   CustomContainer(size&#95;t Size) : Size(Size) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for (size&#95;t I = 0; I != Size; ++I)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       Elements&#91;I&#93; = I;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   friend void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                       const CustomContainer &amp;Value) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     if (Endianness == llvm::endianness::native) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       HBuilder.update(ArrayRef(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;const uint8&#95;t &#42;&gt;(&amp;Value.Size),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           sizeof(Value.Size) + Value.Size &#42; sizeof(Value.Elements&#91;0&#93;)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#125; else &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       // &#96;addRange&#96; will take care of encoding the size.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       HBuilder.addRange(&amp;Value.Elements&#91;0&#93;, &amp;Value.Elements&#91;0&#93; +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       Value.Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;detected&lt;HasAddHashT, T&gt;::value &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">                       !<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashbuilder-detail/ishashabledata">hashbuilder&#95;detail::IsHashableData&lt;T&gt;::value</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Adjust &#96;Value&#96; for the target endianness and add it to the hash.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
